keyMoments.description: Zoro defeats Mr. 1, one of Baroque Works' top agents, representing a major victory for the Straw Hat Pirates in the Alabasta conflict.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the growing strength of the Straw Hat crew members as they take down powerful enemies.

keyMoments.description: Mr. 1, one of Baroque Works' top Officer Agents, is defeated by Roronoa Zoro, marking another loss for the organization in Alabasta.
keyMoments.significance: Represents the continued dismantling of Baroque Works as the Straw Hats and their allies defeat the organization's agents one by one.
